item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting adventure to Costa Rica!

This tour is now closed

Join the club on a group tour January 21 - 28, 2012 to Costa Rica! This is an exciting 8 day adventure to Central America's most incredible country. This tour is an excellent option for those who wish to see the best of Costa Rica with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Price: $1,699 pp, plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: While this trip is adventurous and action packed, it is an excellent trip for beginners as well as those with some experience. The local guides are experienced and regularly guide those who are rafting, rappelling, horseback riding or zipling for the first time. ALL activities can be swapped or removed if you feel they are beyond your comfort zone. Please contact Global Expeditions Club at info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com to discuss.!

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Space will go very quickly (the Costa Rica club trip that the club put together for Jan 2011 SOLD OUT in about 2 months) so be sure get your spot early!

Included in the awesome adventure:
* Expert English and Spanish speaking guides and naturalists
* Up close views of an active volcano
* Canyoneering trip
* Rest and relaxation in natural, volcano heated hot springs
* Guided nature walk at the base of a volcano with a local Naturalist
* Scenic horseback ride alone Lake Arenal
* High-wire canopy zipline ride along the roof of the jungle
* Experience of nature at its best
* 3 days / 2 nights at beach
* OPTIONAL: ATV tour or Class 3-4 whitewater rafting

Places Visited: Costa Rica, Arenal Volcano, La Fortuna, Lake Arenal, Rio Toro, Lost Canyon, San Jose, Samara Beach

-------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 9,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World
item.name: Costa Rica: Eco & Adventure Group Tour - 8 Days
